statements: SELECT id, image_url, video_url, description FROM multimedia_data;
SELECT description, image_url, video_url, id FROM multimedia_data;
SELECT id, image_url FROM multimedia_data WHERE id = 5;
SELECT * FROM multimedia_data WHERE description LIKE '%beautiful%';
SELECT id, video_url FROM multimedia_data ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, image_url, video_url, description FROM multimedia_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT video_url, description, image_url, id FROM multimedia_data WHERE id > 5;
SELECT id, description FROM multimedia_data WHERE image_url LIKE '%example.com%';
SELECT id, video_url FROM multimedia_data WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM multimedia_data ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, image_url, video_url, description FROM multimedia_data;
SELECT description, image_url, video_url, id FROM multimedia_data;
SELECT id, image_url FROM multimedia_data;
SELECT video_url, description FROM multimedia_data;
SELECT * FROM analysis_results;
SELECT * FROM multimedia_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT description, image_url FROM multimedia_data WHERE id = 3;
SELECT data_id, analysis_type, result FROM analysis_results WHERE analysis_type = 'Object Detection' ORDER BY data_id DESC;
SELECT id, video_url, description FROM multimedia_data WHERE image_url LIKE '%background%';
SELECT data_id, analysis_type, result FROM analysis_results WHERE analysis_type = 'Sentiment Analysis' ORDER BY result ASC;
SELECT * FROM researchers;
SELECT id, name, organization FROM researchers;
SELECT name, email FROM researchers WHERE field_of_study='Computer Science';
SELECT * FROM images ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT id, image_url, image_description FROM images WHERE uploaded_by='John Doe';
SELECT * FROM images WHERE id = 1;
SELECT image_url, image_description, upload_date FROM images WHERE uploaded_by = 'user1' ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT id, video_title, uploaded_by FROM videos WHERE video_title LIKE '%tutorial%';
SELECT * FROM researchers WHERE organization = 'ABC University' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, email, field_of_study FROM researchers WHERE field_of_study = 'Computer Science' OR field_of_study = 'Data Science';
SELECT * FROM images;
SELECT image_id, image_url, caption FROM images ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT image_id, image_url, uploaded_by FROM images WHERE uploaded_by='User1';
SELECT * FROM videos WHERE duration > '00:05:00';
SELECT video_id, video_url FROM videos WHERE upload_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM images;
SELECT image_url, caption FROM images WHERE uploaded_by='John Doe';
SELECT image_id, image_url, upload_date FROM images ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM videos WHERE duration > '00:30:00';
SELECT video_id, video_url, uploaded_by FROM videos WHERE upload_date > '2022-01-01' AND upload_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM images;
SELECT image_id, image_url, image_description FROM images WHERE image_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM videos WHERE video_resolution = '1080p';
SELECT video_id, video_url FROM videos ORDER BY video_length DESC;
SELECT ivm.image_id, ivm.video_id, i.image_url, v.video_resolution FROM image_video_mapping ivm LEFT JOIN images i ON ivm.image_id = i.image_id LEFT JOIN videos v ON ivm.video_id = v.video_id;
SELECT * FROM images WHERE image_id = 1;
SELECT image_id, image_url FROM images WHERE image_tags @> '["nature"]';
SELECT im.image_id, im.image_url, vm.metadata_key, vm.metadata_value FROM images im JOIN image_metadata vm ON im.image_id = vm.image_id;
SELECT v.video_id, v.video_length, im.image_url FROM videos v JOIN image_video_mapping ivm ON v.video_id = ivm.video_id JOIN images im ON ivm.image_id = im.image_id;
SELECT im.image_id, im.image_description, v.video_url, v.video_resolution FROM images im JOIN image_video_mapping ivm ON im.image_id = ivm.image_id JOIN videos v ON ivm.video_id = v.video_id;
